1: <pb/><e>A ton bit eb yinatil Coré ti'</e> <pb/><t>¡Tzak'ek e k'ab e masanil ex conoblak! ¡Ex conob, awjanek bay Dios yin tzalojc'ulalil!</t>
2: <t>Yujtol a Jehová, Cham Axac'al Ocok, caw ay is may yayji oc Cham, a ton Cham Yajawilal masanil tx'otx' tx'otx' ti'.</t>
3: <t>Max coc'axcantok conoblak, c'al nacionlak yuj, cax max yaoncan oc eb yalan jikbej on.</t>
4: <t>A Cham max sic'on el tx'otx' tx'otx' ti', bay chi tzalojbi co c'ul ayon yinatil on Jacob ti', tol camc'ulnebil on yuj Cham.</t>
5: <pb/><t>A Jehová Dios mayal ajtok bay is trono xol aw yin tzalojc'ulalil, c'al xol nuk' trompeta.</t>
6: <t>¡Bitnanek, bitnanek bay Dios! ¡Bitnanek, bitnanek bay Cham co Rey!</t>
7: <t>¡Bitnanek yin aloj watx' k'anej bay Dios, yujtol a Cham Yajawil masanil tx'otx' tx'otx'!</t>
8: <t>A Dios ayoc Yajawilal bay masanil nacionlak. Chotan ay Dios bay is trono tol asannej ay yet.</t>
9: <t>Max waj ba eb anima mimek yikbej xol nacionlak, max oc eb co tz'akilok ayon is conobal on is Diosal Abraham ti'.</t>
10: <t>A Dios ay yet eb yajaw bay yulyibank'inal ti'. A Cham chi lajoc yintak masanil.</t>
